title: New Creator: Power Play Series
body:
Info: Established Smash Bros. tournament organizer Dendy Pretendi (of Super Smash Sundays fame) is launching a new online tournament series starting with Super Smash Bros. Melee, and expanding to Killer Instinct, StarCraft II, Hearthstone, TFT, and more. In addition to running tournaments, Power Play will be running a live multi-platform quiz show (initially 3 days per week) on Clubhouse to promote the series and add to the brand's content offering.

Use Cases: 
1) Adoption/Distribution - Power Play will host tournaments and live quiz shows to give away the $POWER coin. After all gift coins are given away, Power Play will continue to add pot bonus prizing to competitions.
2) Holding Incentives - Power Play will use the Discord bot, and also have holder-specific competitions.
3) Transactions - Power Play will drive transactions by allowing registration for tournaments exclusively using their creator coin. Early estimates are $500 in inbound registrations per week.

Community Treasury Tier: $1000

A 'yes' will approve Power Play for the $POWER coin, and a $1000 gift coin grant used as giveaways and pot bonuses.

A 'no' will decline this proposal
author: 0x5ea400d06Afe7aebae54216aDfD7a4bF5f15F993
